content: @Lloyd McKenzie - can you clarify/confirm the official Connectathon Track Proposals due date? We've noticed a discrepancy between the HL7 Calendar date listed as 7/17 (https://confluence.hl7.org/display/HL7/HL7+Calendars) and the 2019-09 Tracks for Connectathon 22 page which states 7/31 (https://confluence.hl7.org/display/HL7/HL7+Calendars). Thanks! cc: @Steve Bratt
@Sandra Vance why is the confluence page different from the regular schedule?
Looks like the regular schedule followed a template and the FMG decided on a different date... July 31 is correct.
